reviewText:
Maple Colors is about a transfer student Ryojiro being assigned to the worst class in school. Before he even makes it to the classroom he gets into a fight along with cute class rep Aoi with some bullies that was set up by the head of the drama club Aizen . On the verge of expulsion , it's suggested that if the class of misfits can come together and produce a play more popular than the drama clubs they'll be forgiven .
 The chore of turning the class into a unified team falls on Ryojiro who uses all options at his disposal , whether they be trickery , besting the student in whatever their forte is or seduction .
 The classmates are the usual mish mash of misfits from the anime genre. There's the rocker , bookworm , alien girl and as they say ' whatever he is ' , along with others .
 This show was surprisingly funny for a hentai title . The artwork was great and the soundtrack was really good .
 The only reason I didn't give a 5 star rating was because it's not a complete series . It says to be continued , but I haven't been able to locate a second season or if it was even made .
 If you want to add to your collection , you should check out Maple Colors .

As other reviewers have noted, there is no end to this movie. There are two parts, although the 2nd part takes a little searching in the menu. There should be at least a 3rd part, but alas, it is non-existent. The art work is ok, but I found the sex very generic and not sensuous at all. The animation was also rather primitive in the sex scenes, making them even less interesting.

The story, such as it is is confusing and pointless, as is all too common in hentai anime. The one bright point was the properly functional menu with extras, mostly previews, but also "Out takes".  These were scenes from the movie humorously overdubbed in Engish.and actually made me laugh out loud. Well done!

All in all I can't recommend this movie very much, but it is inexpensive and some would find it entertaining, thus the three stars.

I got this for my husband - who has a thing for anime girls. Very odd. He really enjoyed it this. I hate anime, and I was actually impressed with it for what it was. We both wish there was less "plot", albeit for different reasons, and we still have no clue if that was the whole series. It just stopped. There was NO conclusion, but it said To Be Continued. I asked my husband about it recently and he said he'd looked, but found no more episodes.

-1 star for the useless/frivolous "plot" and for the lack of ending? I think?

Bottom line: My husband was (frequently and apparently) very happy with it and I was pleasantly surprised, so I recommend this.

As far as this porno goes, the sex scenes were good - but I felt that there was simply not enough action to go around. Half of this title focused on some lackluster storyline that was lost in itself, and nobody could possibly keep up with it or care at all. I'd recommend skipping all of the chitter-chatter and get what most of you came here for. On the upside, there's even a little urination in one scene, which is rare even in this genre. It has its ups and downs.
It was a good a different and done a in good taste, and would let others know it was a good show.

However, I might as well plunge in. Whoops, there goes a pun.
This is a pretty good hentai, with a decent plot and above-par artwork. What I like about it is the fact that none of the scenes get too perverted. The biggest issue is the composition of the disc. I viewed on my PC (Wasn't going to 'enjoy' it in the living room) and found the menu navigation to be horrible. It is faster to use the skip function than it is to find your place using the menu, and the menu seems to only want to show you the first episode. I have yet to watch everything, but when I reached the end of episode one without the plot being resolved, I was very happy to see new credits appear for a second.
Overall it is enjoyable. Maybe not the most memorable characters, but in these things, they rarely are. The big plus is that there is little to be offended by.
Should have mentioned up front that their was more than 1 part. So to get the full story you have to purchase  more dvd s. Not explicit enough.

In this film there's not much of a story. As a matter of fact at the end of the second 30 minute installment it promises to have a continuation, yet there isn't one. It's a typical high school anime with one exception...it has some seriously over exaggerated sex scenes. Plenty of high pitched moaning and sudden confrontations where two characters start doing it with little regard to their surroundings.

The biggest flaw is the lack of a major plot. The plot is so thin I can barely remember what the subject was. Basically a theater group full of misfits and weirdoes in 2-b are trying to prove themselves to be otherwise, but the story is so foggy that after an hour, you're promised more and are given nothing leaving you hanging. The sex scenes were little more than repeat animations, high moans, and over exaggerated wetness. Little substance at all, but the main idea is the sex scenes. As a matter of fact the sudden sex scenes made me wish for more plot along the way.
The story was hard to follow.  The hentai scenes were pretty good.  I bought this movie based on a clip I saw online.  Not one of my favorite hentais.

If your wanting a in depth story look elsewhere but it gets the job done. The sex scenes are some of the better ones I've seen in hentai and the art is well done. Definitely worth checking out if you're a fan of genre.
